1. [Home](https://www.bismarcknd.gov)
2. Departments

# Departments

## Administration

Find information about city elections, permits and licenses, the City Administration, emergency management, communications and more.  
[Administration](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/92/Administration "Administration")

## Airport

View information about flight arrivals, flight departures, and airport layout.  
[Bismarck Airport](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/15/Bismarck-Airport "Bismarck Airport")

## Central Dakota Communications Center (CenCom)

Find information about the city's public safety communication services.  
[Central Dakota Communications Center](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/24/Central-Dakota-Communications-Center-Cen)

## Community Development

View information about Building Inspections, Planning, the Metropolitan Planning Organization, and more.  
[Community Development](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/18/Community-Development "Community Development")

## Engineering

View information about current and future construction projects, roadway lighting, traffic, and more.  
[Engineering](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/17/Engineering "Engineering")

## Event Center

The Bismarck Event Center offers three unique facilities – the Exhibit Hall, Arena and Belle Mehus Auditorium – that combine to offer flexible, dynamic space for your meetings, expos, banquets and entertainment.  
[Bismarck Event Center](https://www.bismarckeventcenter.com "Bismarck Civic Center")

## Finance

Find information about property assessment, special assessments, accounts payable, budgets, and more.  
[Finance](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/25/Finance "Finance")

## Fire

Find information about fire stations, fire safety, permits and more.  
[Fire](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/1898/Fire-Department "Fire")

## GIS / Maps

Access and view maps for the City of Bismarck.  
[GIS / Maps](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/20/GIS-Maps "GIS / Maps")

## Human Resources

Find information about current employment opportunities and employee benefits.  
[Human Resources](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/21/Human-Resources "Human Resources")

## Legal

Download the City Code of Ordinances and the Liability Claim Form.  
[Legal](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/16/Legal "City Attorney")

## Library

Find information about the library catalog, eResources, teen zone, supporting the library, and more.  
[Bismarck Veterans Memorial Public Library](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/23/Bismarck-Veterans-Memorial-Public-Librar "Bismarck Veterans Memorial Public Library")

## Municipal Court

Read information about criminal and non-criminal procedures, posting bond, and what you should know before you come to court.  
[Municipal Court](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/93/Municipal-Court "Municipal Court")

## Police

View information about animal control, online police report filing, records, crime prevention, and more.  
[Police](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/94/Police "Police")

## Public Health

Find information about adult wellness services, immunizations, nutrition services, environmental health, food inspections, permits and more.  
[Public Health](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/95/Public-Health "Public Health")

## Public Works

View information about forestry, water, streets, recycling, and more.  
[Public Works](https://www.bismarcknd.gov/96/Public-Works "Public Works")
